content.question: Which of the following would tend to support Chirac’s characterization of the attitude of the majority of French people toward Nazi ideology?

choices.label: French partisans resisting German occupation received widespread clandestine support.
Free French forces operating outside France were supplied and equipped by Britain and the United States.
Most of France was under direct German military control after France’s defeat in 1940.
French armies were rapidly defeated by German forces employing blitzkrieg tactics in 1940.

content.answer: French partisans resisting German occupation received widespread clandestine support.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
